Product Title: Breaking Bad
Review Date: 2015/08/26
Categories: Suspense, Drama
Product Description: ["In Season 3's finale, Jesse (Aaron Paul) was on the run, with Mike (Jonathan Banks) in hot pursuit, while Walt (Bryan Cranston) negotiated for his life with Gus (Giancarlo Esposito). In a desperate attempt to escape certain death, Walt concocted a disturbing plan — kill his former lab assistant Gale — to provide for his and Jesse's safety. The scheme ultimately forced Jesse to Gale's doorstep ..."]

Product Title: The Fourth Wise Man
Review Date: 2016/02/22
Store: Eileen Brennan  (Actor),     Ralph Belamy  (Actor),     Michael Ray Rhodes  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama
Product Description: ["Based on Henry van Dyke's classic, The Story of the Other Wise Man, this fictional story set in Biblical times is told in gently comic terms. A Magi named Artaban (Martin Sheen) sees a sign in the heavens that he hopes will lead him and his faithful servant to the Messiah. Artaban takes with him three precious gifts to present to the Messiah. For 33 years Artaban pursues Jesus, only to miss Him at every turn."]
Average Rating: 4.6

Review Text: I love this show. I watched it as a kid, but now I enjoy it with my elderly mother, she loves Ben Cartwright!
Review Title: Mama loves Ben!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2016/12/27
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Charles Walters'], 'Producers': ['Arthur Freed'], 'Starring': ['Judy Garland', 'Fred Astaire', 'Peter Lawford'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']}
Review Text: What a great show! The singing is wonderful but the DANCING is unbelievably beautiful! The color version is bright and fun to watch. I like the hats and clothes, but the children loved the dancing the most. Great show for everyone!
Review Title: A show for the whole family!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===

Average Rating: 3.7

Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2017/01/20
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Robert Wise'], 'Producers': ['Saul Chaplin', 'Robert Wise', 'Peter Levathes', 'Richard D. Zanuck'], 'Starring': ['Julie Andrews', 'Christopher Plummer', 'Eleanor Parker'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']}
Review Text: My mother watched this every other day. She went to to the area this was filmed about thrity year ago. I love to listen to the songs over and over. Great story, great movie, great songs and excellent movie for everyone
Review Title: A movie everyone will LOVE!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Fabulous Dorseys
Review Date: 2017/01/28
Categories: Romance, Arts, Entertainment, and Culture, Inspiring, Nostalgic
Product Description: ['The biography of the Dorsey Brothers. Though the Big Band era crown The Dorsey Brothers as one of swingdom\'s greatest musical teams, their feuding since childhood was also legendary. Quarrelling brothers are reunited on the death of their father. This is their biography featuring many of their hit songs, such as "Marie" and "Green Eyes" highlighted by a jam session with Art Tatum, Charlie Barnet, Ziggy Elman and Ray Bauduc.']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Alfred E. Green'], 'Producers': ['Charles R. Rogers', 'John W. Rogers'], 'Starring': ['Tommy Dorsey', 'Jimmy Dorsey', 'Janet Blair']}
Review Text: My sick mother enjoys older movies and this is one of her favorites! We both enjoy the wonderful music.
Review Title: Love the music!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2017/01/28
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Stanley Donen'], 'Producers': ['Arthur Freed'], 'Starring': ['Fred Astaire', 'Jane Powell'], 'Studio': ['Synergy Ent']}
Review Text: Winter, Spring Summer and Fall this movie is fun to watch all year. The dancing is awesome, I also enjoy the music. My nine year old grandson lives to watch this with his grandmother.
Review Title: Great movie for entire family.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: The Danny Thomas Show
Review Date: 2018/05/02
Categories: Comedy
Product Description: ["Season 1 begins with Danny and Kathy's honeymoon. A widow and widower, they met when Kathy was hired as a nurse when Rusty had the measles. The Williams family moves into a brand new apartment and Angela Cartwright joined the cast as Kathy's daughter Linda, who was then adopted by Danny. William Demerest played Kathy's father, and with Hans Conreid as Uncle Tonoose, both families approved."]
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Sheldon Leonard'], 'Producers': ['Sheldon Leonard'], 'Starring': ['Danny Thomas', 'Marjorie Lord', 'Sherry Jackson']}
Review Text: The best family show ever. It is still very relevant now. My mother loves the music and I too enjoy seeing all his special guests,  including Lucy and Andy Griffith
Review Title: Great family show
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2018/05/02
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Sheldon Leonard'], 'Producers': ['Sheldon Leonard'], 'Starring': ['Danny Thomas', 'Marjorie Lord', 'Rusty Hamer'], 'Studio': ['Stadium Media']}
Review Text: I remember watching as a kid but now the great stories of kindness and familia.  I love the music. I hope Amazon will get the rest of the seasons!
Review Title: Best tv show ever
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has enjoyed multiple television shows and movies, frequently praising captivating storytelling and engaging content. The viewing experiences have often led to feelings of nostalgia and joy, particularly in family settings. Highlights include shows that provide strong entertainment value, with memorable music and dance performances being especially appreciated. The user expressed love for titles that appealed both to them and their family members, demonstrating a preference for content that encourages shared viewing experiences.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
While the user's feedback overall has been positive, one interaction reveals an instance of disappointment with a specific title rated lower than others. The lower rating suggests a lack of overall impact or resonance, contrasting with their higher ratings for other products. However, specific dislikes or critical points about this experience were not detailed, indicating that it might not have met the expected standards set by prior purchases.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user exhibits a clear inclination towards engaging and nostalgic media, frequently enjoying shows and movies rated highly. Positive remarks highlight the captivating storytelling, quality music, and the ability to foster family engagement. Despite an overall favorable sentiment, there's a noticeable lower rating hinting at some dissatisfaction, suggesting that not all purchases met the user’s high expectations. This mix of positive and less favorable feedback reflects a discerning taste in entertainment that values both enjoyment and familial connections.

target_interaction.title: Great Fun for Entire Family
target_interaction.text:
This is my all time favorite movie ever!! Going up in the,'60&70's all this is great clean fun for the whole family. I love anything with Don Knotts, but this calms me at 58 years young this movie is still fun with the Y generation. Thanks again for having it available.
Please get Make Room for Daddy color version. I have all the black and white. My. 88 year old mother and I watch together and love the stories and songs are timeless too. Like Barney and Andy.
